Script: LYRA: Saw it's Lyra.It's happened. He's come for us. SAW: You know what to do.
Dialogue: Saw it's Lyra.It's happened. He's come for us. SAW: You know what to do.

Script: STORMTROOPER: Get out of the way. Move! Move! CASSIAN:Calm down.Calm down. We'll be all right.
Dialogue: Get out of the way. Move! Move! CASSIAN:Calm down.Calm down. We'll be all right.

Script: BODHI:Is that him?He looks kind of different than I imagined. MILITIA: (On your feet! It’s the pilot the defector) BODHI: Okay so you're-you're Saw Gerrera? Saw Gerrera. No? Okay we're just wasting time that we don't have. I need to speak to Saw Gerrera! I keep telling them before before it's too late. (MILITIA: Keep your heads down! The Imperials will be searching for him…) BODHI: We're out here in the middle of nowhere.We need to get to Jedha City.What part of urgent message do you guys not understand? Hey! we're all on the same side if you just see past the uniform for a minute. I've got to speak to ah... I've got to speak to Saw Gerrera.
Dialogue: Is that him?He looks kind of different than I imagined. MILITIA: (On your feet! It’s the pilot the defector) BODHI: Okay so you're-you're Saw Gerrera? Saw Gerrera. No? Okay we're just wasting time that we don't have. I need to speak to Saw Gerrera! I keep telling them before before it's too late. (MILITIA: Keep your heads down! The Imperials will be searching for him…) BODHI: We're out here in the middle of nowhere.We need to get to Jedha City.What part of urgent message do you guys not understand? Hey! we're all on the same side if you just see past the uniform for a minute. I've got to speak to ah... I've got to speak to Saw Gerrera.

Script: GENERAL DRAVEN:You're currently calling yourself Liana Hallik. Is that correct? Possession of unsanctioned weapons forgery of Imperial documents aggravated assaultescape from custody resisting arrest Imagine if the Imperial authorities had found out who you really were. Jyn Erso? That's your given name is it not? Jyn Erso? Daughter of Galen Erso. A known Imperial collaborator in weapons development. JYN ERSO: What is this? MON MOTHMA: It's a chance for you to make a fresh start.
Dialogue: You're currently calling yourself Liana Hallik. Is that correct? Possession of unsanctioned weapons forgery of Imperial documents aggravated assaultescape from custody resisting arrest Imagine if the Imperial authorities had found out who you really were. Jyn Erso? That's your given name is it not? Jyn Erso? Daughter of Galen Erso. A known Imperial collaborator in weapons development. JYN ERSO: What is this? MON MOTHMA: It's a chance for you to make a fresh start.

Script: CASSIAN: He'd remember you though wouldn't he? He might agree to meet you if you came as a friend. DRAVEN:We're up against the clock here girl So if there's nothing to talk about we'll just put you back where we found you.
Dialogue: He'd remember you though wouldn't he? He might agree to meet you if you came as a friend. DRAVEN:We're up against the clock here girl So if there's nothing to talk about we'll just put you back where we found you.

Script: CASSIAN: There's an Imperial defector in Jedha. A pilot. He's being held by Saw Gerrera. He's claiming the Emperor is creating a weapon with the power to destroy entire planets. The pilot says he was sent by your father. MON MOTHMA: We need to stop this weapon before it is finished. DRAVEN:Captain Andor's mission is to authenticate the pilot's story and then if possible find your father. MON MOTHMA: It appears he is critical to the development of this superweapon. Given the gravity of the situation and your history with Sawwe're hoping that he will help us locate your father and return him to the Senate for testimony.
Dialogue: There's an Imperial defector in Jedha. A pilot. He's being held by Saw Gerrera. He's claiming the Emperor is creating a weapon with the power to destroy entire planets. The pilot says he was sent by your father. MON MOTHMA: We need to stop this weapon before it is finished. DRAVEN:Captain Andor's mission is to authenticate the pilot's story and then if possible find your father. MON MOTHMA: It appears he is critical to the development of this superweapon. Given the gravity of the situation and your history with Sawwe're hoping that he will help us locate your father and return him to the Senate for testimony.

Script: GALEN:What's the matter Jyn? You looked frightened.I'll always protect you. Stardust. Don't ever change. LYRA:Trust...
Dialogue: What's the matter Jyn? You looked frightened.I'll always protect you. Stardust. Don't ever change. LYRA:Trust...

Script: CASSIAN: It's 'what are they taking out?' Kyber crystal. All they can get. We wondered why they were stripping the temple now we know.It's the fuel for the weapon. K2-SO: The weapon your father's building.
Dialogue: It's 'what are they taking out?' Kyber crystal. All they can get. We wondered why they were stripping the temple now we know.It's the fuel for the weapon. K2-SO: The weapon your father's building.

Script: CITIZEN: Quickly the kyber get it. Here take the kyber. Take the kyber.Come on! CASSIAN: This way!
Dialogue: Quickly the kyber get it. Here take the kyber. Take the kyber.Come on! CASSIAN: This way!

Script: STORMTROOPER: He's blind. STORMTROOPER: Is he deaf?
Dialogue: He's blind. STORMTROOPER: Is he deaf?

Script: CHIRRUT: Can't you see we are no friends of the Empire? MILITIA: (Tell that to the one who killed our men.)
Dialogue: Can't you see we are no friends of the Empire? MILITIA: (Tell that to the one who killed our men.)

Script: JYN ERSO: Anyone who kills me or my friends will answer to Saw Gerrera. MILITIA: (And why Is that?) JYN ERSO: Because I am the daughter of Galen Erso. MILITIA: (Take them!)
Dialogue: Anyone who kills me or my friends will answer to Saw Gerrera. MILITIA: (And why Is that?) JYN ERSO: Because I am the daughter of Galen Erso. MILITIA: (Take them!)

Script: BAZE: He's praying for the door to open. CHIRRUT: It bothers him because he knows it is possible. Baze Malbus was once the most devoted Guardian of us all.
Dialogue: He's praying for the door to open. CHIRRUT: It bothers him because he knows it is possible. Baze Malbus was once the most devoted Guardian of us all.

Script: TARKIN: That won't be necessary. We need a statement not a manifesto. The Holy City will be enough for the day. KRENNIC: Target Jedha City prepare single reactor ignition.
Dialogue: That won't be necessary. We need a statement not a manifesto. The Holy City will be enough for the day. KRENNIC: Target Jedha City prepare single reactor ignition.

Script: BAZE: Chirrut let's go! CASSIAN: [to Bodhi]Come on! Let's get out of here!
Dialogue: Chirrut let's go! CASSIAN: [to Bodhi]Come on! Let's get out of here!

Script: KRENNIC: That was only an inkling of it's destructive potential. TARKIN:I will tell him that I will be taking control over the weapon I first spoke of years ago effective immediately.
Dialogue: That was only an inkling of it's destructive potential. TARKIN:I will tell him that I will be taking control over the weapon I first spoke of years ago effective immediately.

Script: JYN: That's ridiculous. We all got the message.Everyone here knows it. K2-SO:One blast to the reactor module and the whole system goes down. That's how you said it. The whole system goes down.
Dialogue: That's ridiculous. We all got the message.Everyone here knows it. K2-SO:One blast to the reactor module and the whole system goes down. That's how you said it. The whole system goes down.

Script: BODHI:This way. CASSIAN:I'll be right behind you. Come on.
Dialogue: This way. CASSIAN:I'll be right behind you. Come on.

Script: KRENNIC: Jedha. Saw Gerrera.His band of fanatics. Their Holy City. The last reminder of the Jedi. Gone. GALEN: You'll never win.
Dialogue: Jedha. Saw Gerrera.His band of fanatics. Their Holy City. The last reminder of the Jedi. Gone. GALEN: You'll never win.

Script: DRAVEN:To lure our forces into a final battle. To destroy us once and for all. VASPAR:To risk everything based on what? The testimony of a criminal? The dying words of her father an Imperial scientist?
Dialogue: To lure our forces into a final battle. To destroy us once and for all. VASPAR:To risk everything based on what? The testimony of a criminal? The dying words of her father an Imperial scientist?

Script: REBEL: Yes. JYN:Every moment you waste is another step closer to the ashes of Jedha.
Dialogue: Yes. JYN:Every moment you waste is another step closer to the ashes of Jedha.

Script: CASSIAN: But I do. I believe you.We'd like to volunteer. Some of us... ... most of us we've done terrible things on behalf of the Rebellion. We're spies. Saboteurs. Assassins. Everything I did I did for the Rebellion. And every time I walked away from something I wanted to forget I told myself it was for a cause that I believed in. A cause that was worth it. Without that we're lost.Everything we've done would have been for nothing. I couldn't face myself if I gave up now.  of us could. It won't be comfortable. BODHI:It'll be a bit cramped but we'll all fit.We could go.
Dialogue: But I do. I believe you.We'd like to volunteer. Some of us... ... most of us we've done terrible things on behalf of the Rebellion. We're spies. Saboteurs. Assassins. Everything I did I did for the Rebellion. And every time I walked away from something I wanted to forget I told myself it was for a cause that I believed in. A cause that was worth it. Without that we're lost.Everything we've done would have been for nothing. I couldn't face myself if I gave up now.  of us could. It won't be comfortable. BODHI:It'll be a bit cramped but we'll all fit.We could go.

Script: BODHI: Or stolen. JYN:And if they have?
Dialogue: Or stolen. JYN:And if they have?

Script: K2-SO: Impressive. JYN: I'll tell the others.
Dialogue: Impressive. JYN: I'll tell the others.

Script: INSPECTOR: That would be helpful. BODHI: It's just down here.
Dialogue: That would be helpful. BODHI: It's just down here.

Script: BLUE LEADER: Stop right there Private. MON MOTHMA: Let him speak.
Dialogue: Stop right there Private. MON MOTHMA: Let him speak.

Script: REBEL: Intercepted Imperial transmission ma'am. Rebels on Scarif. MON MOTHMA: I need to speak to Admiral Raddus.
Dialogue: Intercepted Imperial transmission ma'am. Rebels on Scarif. MON MOTHMA: I need to speak to Admiral Raddus.

Script: CHIRRUT: Run! REBEL:Retreat. Retreat!
Dialogue: Run! REBEL:Retreat. Retreat!

Script: BLUE EIGHT: We won't have long. SHIELD OFFICER: Close the field aperture now. Close it!
Dialogue: We won't have long. SHIELD OFFICER: Close the field aperture now. Close it!

Script: BODHI:They closed the shield gate we're stuck here. But the rebel fleet is pulling in.We just have to get a signal strong enough to get through to them and let them know we're trapped down here. For that we have to connect to the communications tower. Now I can patch us in over here the landing pad but you have to get on the radio get one of the guys out there to find a master switch. Get them to activate the connection between us and that comm tower. REBEL: Okay.
Dialogue: They closed the shield gate we're stuck here. But the rebel fleet is pulling in.We just have to get a signal strong enough to get through to them and let them know we're trapped down here. For that we have to connect to the communications tower. Now I can patch us in over here the landing pad but you have to get on the radio get one of the guys out there to find a master switch. Get them to activate the connection between us and that comm tower. REBEL: Okay.

Script: TONC: Melshi. Melshi come in are you there? Bodhi will send a signal from here. He's patching us in.But you guys have to open up a line for the tower. MELSHI: How? Please advise.
Dialogue: Melshi. Melshi come in are you there? Bodhi will send a signal from here. He's patching us in.But you guys have to open up a line for the tower. MELSHI: How? Please advise.

Script: MELSHI: Master switch describe what are we looking for? TONC: What does it look like? The master switch? Where is it?
Dialogue: Master switch describe what are we looking for? TONC: What does it look like? The master switch? Where is it?

Script: RED PILOT: We have no effect on that shield. GOLD PILOT: How much more can that thing take?
Dialogue: We have no effect on that shield. GOLD PILOT: How much more can that thing take?

Script: TARKIN: Lord Vader will handle the fleet. Target the base at Scarif. Single reactor ignition. ROMODI: Yes sir.
Dialogue: Lord Vader will handle the fleet. Target the base at Scarif. Single reactor ignition. ROMODI: Yes sir.
